channel.title: [PI]Life After Death V2||317||DEDI SERVER||Looking for staff||
channel.description:
Owners -Supaman -Satis
Source coders -VACANT(Head coder) -Supaman -Vacant -Vacant
Webclient coders -VACANT -VACANT
ADMINS 1/5 Moderators (TBD)
Want instant communication? irishfball4@hotmail.com Skype: Patatac2
We are looking for a devoted team to help us succeed. We currently have a dedicated server, running off of a modified PI source. The most valued at the moment would be a webclient coder, I can code servers but not webclients.
Application: Name: Age: Applying for: Past experience: Can you code java: If so years coding java: And Proof (screens, videos etc.): Are you prepared to use TS3 (do you have a mic?): Contact info:
--FEATURES-- All items working Updated graphics dung skillcapes Donator shops and islands Fully working dedicated server
